publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3956.1 Mr Kenneth Gibson: European Year of Disabled Peopleâ€”As an amendment to motion (S1M-3956) in the name of Ms Margaret Curran, insert at end ", accepting that much more needs to be done to ensure that Scotland is fully compliant with the Disability Discrimination Act 1995."
